promptForName: Generate a unique, original, creative, single-word name for a gigantic simple ibex grass-type pokemon wearing dark armor. It can be found in jungle-like environments. Do not use the words pokemon, grass or ibex. Ony answer with the generated name
promptForDescription: Generate a short, original, creative Pokedex description for Arboguard, a a gigantic simple ibex grass-type pokemon. It can be found in jungle-like environments It has the following abilities: Spit Beam. Be creative about its day-to-day life. Do not use the words "ibex", "grass" or "Arboguard". Use a maximum of 150 characters. Only answer with the generated description.
promptForVisual: mdjrny-v4 style portrait of grass-type pokemon, ibex-like, simple, digital art, sugimori, chibi, centered, full body, sunlight ray ambience
generatedDescription: Behold the mighty Arboguard—this colossal jungle dweller grazes on treetops and emits dazzling Spit Beams to fend off foes, earning its title as protector of the wild.
